label: Wilcoxon Rank Sum and Signed Rank Tests
info: Performs one- and two-sample Wilcoxon tests on vectors of data; the latter is also known as ‘Mann-Whitney’ test.

categories.label: Input
categories.info: Controls to specify parameters of the test

input_x.label: variable 1
input_x.info: Column selected to perform the test on

input_y.label: variable 2
input_y.info: Optional column selected to perform the test

input_mu.label: mean
input_mu.info: a number specifying an optional parameter used to form the null hypothesis

input_paired.label: paired
input_paired.info: a logical indicating whether you want a paired test

input_exact.label: exact p-value
input_exact.info: a logical indicating whether an exact p-value should be computed. If not, a normal approximation is used.

input_correct.label: continuity correction
input_correct.info: a logical indicating whether to apply continuity correction in the normal approximation for the p-value

input_confint.label: confidence interval
input_confint.info: a logical indicating whether a confidence interval should be computed
